Comments_List:
AMAZING CLASS. I don't have any comments about any weaknesses. At first I was nervous because I took biology and chemistry in College and I was scared it would be a review. However, her class was sooooooooo awesome and so applicable to Public Health. I loved it so much. I wish she had more classes and I wish I could have taken this earlier.

I will say though that many students who wanted to take the class could not beacuase Biostats 2 is offered at the same time and EHS students are required to take the class. Just a heads up if you wanted higher enrollment.
strength: good evaluation and learning experience of systematic biology
She is amazing!!!!! SOOOOO smart, SOOOOO clear, SOOO fun! She seriously knows her stuff and I was never scared to approach her.
Great Professor, really enjoyed being in her class
a great course with biology knowledge
